text: cea mi hen dxk hrux wa thæ cring xallxhˌ thrng hı klangkhun khabkeiyw kheapi nı wela klangwan læa thrng hı klangwan khabkeiyw kheapi nı wela klangkhun læa thrng srang hı dwng xathity læa dwng canthr (pen prayochn kæ mnusʹy) thuk sing khocr pi tam wara thi kahnd wi læa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng ru di ying nı sing thi phwk cea kratha
